So.. you were alive at Sekigahara eh? You must have been very young and
liv=
ed a long time, as the code of Bushido was first written down a
little over=
 100 years after the battle. Then again, what do I know, I
wasn't even ther=
e:-)

Yours bemused and amused

Dean
